acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should fill Java native types
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldFillJavaNativeTypes

test-step.description: When I invoke the factory to manufacture <span class='step-parameter'>class java.lang.String with the fullest constructor
Then the String field 鹞鸆鸠鹖鹠 cannot be null or empty
When I invoke the factory manufacturing for <span class='step-parameter'>class java.lang.Integer
Then the integer field should not be null
When I invoke the factory manufacturing for <span class='step-parameter'>class java.util.GregorianCalendar
Then the calendar object should not be null
When I invoke the factory manufacturing for <span class='step-parameter'>class java.util.Date
Then the Date object should not be null
When I invoke the factory manufacturing for <span class='step-parameter'>class java.math.BigDecimal
Then the Object should not be null
